page.title: 13Primary School Life
page.content: It is Wednesday morning and my alarm has just gone off.It is 8.10 a.m.I get dressed and go down to breakfast,I think I will have cornflakes today.It is 8.45 a.m. and I am on my way tyo school.At 9.00 a.m. my teacher Mr.Cannell takes the regiter.We have silent reading.At 9.30 we go to our maths groups.At 10.15 a.m. we all have assembly.Next it is play time. At 10.45 a.m. we have English and then the morning finishes and we have lunch.School starts again at 1.15p.m.Our class comes in and gets on with topic work.After playtime Mr.Cannell tells us to line up,as it is swimming day.The coach takes us to the baths and we get back at about 4.00 p.m.End of the school day.
